description: To maintain the existing fleet of Cowboy Aircraft in tactical condition the following spare parts will be required. These replacement spares are of commodities not normally included in a tactical unit armoury, however upgrade in modernization plans of our current fleet aircraft command that Regional and operational needs require item retention at level of minimum stock.",
full_summary:
### Spare Parts Buy for Air Centric/Refueling

**Tender Announcement**
**Reference Number:** cb-9298-65921553
**Amendment Number:** 7
**Solicitation Number:** W8486-249302/A

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding

**Preview of Requirement**
The Department of National Defence (DND) seeks to source spare parts for air centric/refueling applications. The delivery of goods is expected at two locations:

* Department of National Defence 25 CFSD Montreal
* Department of National Defence 7 CF Supply Depot Edmonton

**Eligibility:** The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada. Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation process within 15 working days from receipt of the results.

**Submission Requirements:**

* Electronic submission only via email to: DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca.
* File format: PDF or Word Document
* Size limit: (to be specified)
* Language: Either English or French

**Technical and Commercial Evaluation**

* Bidders must provide separate prices for the requirement.
* If the bidder provides an equivalent or substitute product, the bidder must indicate the brand name, model, part number, and NATO Supply Classification Code (NSCC) or Commercial and Government Entity (CAGE) code.

**Health Canada Processes and Conditions**
There are no special processes or conditions to be noted.

**Award Criteria:** Lowest Price

**Key Dates:**

* Tender Closing Date: 2023-11-28T14:00:00
* Amendment Date: 2023-11-28

**Attachments:** Please refer to the following links for more information on the tender: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/9298/w8486-249302-rfp-%28en_0.pdf and https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/11622/w8486-249302-amendment-001-bilingual_0.pdf

**Important Contact Information**

* Primary Contact: Kerim Tosun, Email: [kerim.tosun@forces.gc.ca](mailto:kerim.tosun@forces.gc.ca), Phone: (000) 000-0000,
